title: Is There A Driverless Car In Your Future?
teaser: Earlier this week, Google debuted a fully functional driverless car â€” one built without a steering wheel or brake pedals. NPR's Arun Rath talks with Brad Templeton, who's advised Google on its car program, about what a future without drivers might look like.
